prompt_instruction: translate code from cobol to java

cbl_in_ex:
DEMO-TASKA.
 
 * This is prompt example 1 *  
MOVE 'HELLO WORLD' TO VA-TAB  
MOVE '45' TO CA-PAYMENT  

IF MAN-BOOKER IS EQUAL TO 24
 EXEC SQL
   INSERT INTO ADDR
             ( NUMBER,
               NAME)
      VALUES ( :SAN-NUM,
               :SHAP-VALUE)              
 END-EXEC
 IF SQLCODE NOT EQUAL 0
   PERFORM TRAN-RATE-INTERVAL
   EXEC STATEMENT1 END-EXEC
 END-IF
ENDIF
 EXEC SQL
        SET :SAN-NUM = IDENTITY_VAL_LOCAL() 
 END-EXEC 
 
 MOVE  SAN-NUM TO PY-RES-INT
 MOVE 25 TO MAN-BOOKER

 EXIT.
vcmap_in_ex:
VA-TAB, X(4), recordBook.retailName.tabValue,  String
MAN-BOOKER, X(6), markDanson.post.manBooker, String
CA-PAYMENT, X(2), this.caPayment, int
PY-RES-INT, 99, this.pyResInt, int
SHAP-VALUE, 9(4), this.retail.shapValue, int

cbl_in_ex:
BUZZ-VAL. 

* This is prompt example 2 * 

 IF CAN-BANK-VAL IS EQUAL TO 87
 EXEC SQL
   INSERT INTO BANK
             ( NUM,
               LOCATION)
      VALUES ( DEFAULT,
               :SYS-GERM)
 END-EXEC
 IF SQLCODE NOT EQUAL 0   
   MOVE '10' TO CA-SUM-ASSURED
   PERFORM PRINT-FUNCTION
   EXEC STATEMENT2 END-EXEC
 END-IF
END-IF
EXIT.
vcmap_in_ex:
SYS-GERM, X(5), sysGerm, String
CAN-BANK-VAL, 9(3), bankVar.canBankVal, int
CA-SUM-ASSURED, 99, this.caSumAssured, int
